div.p:
We'll start by creating our own General to lead our men in battle.
We can modify this "Avatar" as we play. Our avatar will level up, earn
new skills, armour sets, and powerful followers and objects called "Retainers".

We'll name our avatar and customise his look. On this screen we can
assign armour and equipment pieces that are collected
as we play. We can change the colour scheme of all these pieces.

Our Avatar also needs a banner. There are multiple designs of "Mon"
to choose from, and a full range of colours for us to play with.

We'll also choose a starting province here. Each province has its
own unique benefits; we can click on each one to view the details.

On the avatar screen we can choose to edit our banner, customise
our avatar and equipment and get a view on current progress

towards our next level. We can also see the traits we've gained and
our chosen retainers for the next battle.
